original: don dam pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that ultimate emptiness is arising or ceasing.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that conditioned emptiness is arising or ceasing.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of the compounded is produced or that it ceases.🔽He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of the uncompounded is produced or that it ceases.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is produced or that it ceases.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is produced or that it ceases.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of inherent existence is produced or that it ceases.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of all things is produced or that it ceases.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya @192b bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya @192b bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of defining attributes is produced or that it ceases.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of nonapprehension is produced or that it ceases.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of non-apprehension arises or ceases.🔽He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of essential nature arises or ceases.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence arises or ceases.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the applications of mindfulness arise or cease.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the right efforts arise or cease.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dbang po rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // dbang po rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the legs of miraculous power arise or cease.🔽He does not join with the idea that the faculties arise or cease.

original: stobs rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the idea that the powers arise or cease.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the limbs of awakening arise or cease;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the noble eightfold path arises or ceases;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the noble truths arise or cease;

original: bsam gtan rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the meditative concentrations arise or cease;

original: tshad med pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the immeasurables arise or cease;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the formless absorptions arise or cease;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i @193a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // mthar gyis gnas pa'i @193a *//
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the eight deliverances arise or cease;

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dgu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dgu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the idea that the nine serial absorptions arise or cease;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signlessness meditative stabilization, and the wishlessness meditative stabilization arise or do not arise.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the five eyes arise or do not arise.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the six sense fields arise or do not arise.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the ten powers arise or do not arise.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the four fearlessnesses arise or do not arise.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the four detailed and thorough knowledges arise or do not arise.

original: byams pa chen po skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the great love arises or does not arise.

original: snying rje chen po skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that great compassion is with or without end;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are with or without end;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the fruit of entering the stream is with or without end;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is with or without end; they do not engage with the notion that the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is with or without end;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that arhatship is with or without end;

original: rang byang chub skye zhes bya ba'am @193b 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub skye zhes bya ba'am @193b 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that individual enlightenment is with or without end;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the knowledge of path aspects is with or without end;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not apply the term ‘arising’ to the knowledge of all aspects, nor the term ‘cessation.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice accordingly

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: are said to be diligent in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they do not apply the term ‘past’ to physical forms,

original: gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not apply the term ‘future’ to physical forms,

original: gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not apply the term ‘present’ to physical forms.🔽They do not apply the term ‘past’ to feelings,

original: tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not apply the term ‘future’ to feelings,

original: tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: and they do not apply the term ‘present’ to feelings.

original: 'du shes 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the term ‘past’ to perceptions,

original: 'du shes ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that perception is future,

original: 'du shes da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'du byed 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'du byed 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that perception is present.🔽one should not practice with the idea that volitional factors are past,

original: 'du byed ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that volitional factors are future,

original: 'du byed da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that volitional factors are present.🔽one should not practice with the idea that consciousness is past,

original: rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that consciousness is future,

original: rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mig 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // mig 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that consciousness is present.🔽one should not practice with the idea that the eyes are past,

original: mig ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽mig da ltar byung ba zhes bya @194a *//
analyzed: mig ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // mig da ltar byung ba zhes bya @194a *//

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // yang dag par spong ba rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not to be conjoined with the present.🔽The correct exertions are not to be conjoined with the past.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The correct exertions are not to be conjoined with the future.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the correct exertions are present,🔽they do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous ability are past,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous ability are future,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dbang po rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // dbang po rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the supports for miraculous ability are present,🔽they do not engage with the notion that the faculties are past,

original: dbang po rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the faculties are future,

original: dbang po rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽stobs rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dbang po rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // stobs rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the faculties are present,🔽they do not engage with the notion that the powers are past,

original: stobs rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the powers are future,

original: stobs rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the powers are present,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the branches of enlightenment are past,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the aspects of enlightenment are past,🔽they do not engage with the notion that the aspects of enlightenment are future,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the aspects of enlightenment are present,🔽they do not engage with the notion that the noble eightfold path is past,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the noble eightfold path is future,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa @199b da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa @199b da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the noble eightfold path is present,🔽they do not engage with the notion that the four noble truths are past,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the four noble truths are future,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽bsam gtan rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // bsam gtan rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the four noble truths are present,🔽they do not engage with the notion that the meditative stabilities are past,

original: bsam gtan rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the meditative stabilities are future,

original: bsam gtan rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽tshad med pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // tshad med pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: the meditative stabilities are not joined with the present,🔽the immeasurable aspirations are not joined with the past,

original: tshad med pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: the immeasurable aspirations are not joined with the future,

original: tshad med pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: the immeasurable aspirations are not joined with the present,🔽the formless absorptions are not joined with the past,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: the formless absorptions are not joined with the future,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par thar pa brgyad 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam par thar pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: the formless absorptions are not joined with the present,🔽the eight aspects of liberation are not joined with the past,🔽the eight aspects of liberation are not joined with the future,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: the eight aspects of liberation are not joined with the present,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: nor do they apply the designation ‘the nine serial steps of meditative absorption that have not yet occurred.’

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽@200a *// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // @200a *// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the nine serial steps of meditative absorption that are present.’🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation that have ceased’

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: nor do they apply the designation ‘the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation that have not yet occurred.’

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation that are present.’

original: mngon par shes pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the superknowledges that have ceased’

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The superknowledges are future’;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // ting nge 'dzin rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The superknowledges are present.’🔽“They do not engage with the statement, ‘The meditative stabilities are past’;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The meditative stabilities are future’;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The meditative stabilities are present.’🔽“They do not engage with the statement, ‘The dhāraṇī gateways are past’;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The dhāraṇī gateways are future’;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The dhāraṇī gateways are present.’🔽“They do not engage with the statement, ‘The ten powers of the tathāgatas are past’;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the statement, ‘The ten powers of the tathāgatas are future’;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the ten powers of the tathāgatas are present’ to the ten powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the four assurances of the tathāgatas are past’ to the four assurances.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi @200b sbyor ro; ;mi 'jigs pa bzhi da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi @200b sbyor ro; ;mi 'jigs pa bzhi da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the four assurances of the tathāgatas are future’ to the four assurances. They do not apply the designation ‘the four assurances of the tathāgatas are present’ to the four assurances.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the four kinds of exact knowledge of the tathāgatas are past’ to the four kinds of exact knowledge.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘the four kinds of exact knowledge of the tathāgatas are future’ to the four kinds of exact knowledge.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽byams pa chen po 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // byams pa chen po 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘the four kinds of exact knowledge of the tathāgatas are present’ to the four kinds of exact knowledge.🔽They do not apply the designation ‘great love of the tathāgatas is past’ to great love.

original: byams pa chen po ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘great love of the tathāgatas is future’ to great love.

original: byams pa chen po da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘great love of the tathāgatas is present’ to great love.

original: snying rje chen po 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the designation ‘great compassion of the tathāgatas is past’ to great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that great compassion is future.

original: snying rje chen po da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that great compassion is present.🔽one should not practice with the idea that the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha are past,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha are future,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha are present.🔽one should not practice with the idea that the fruit of entering the stream is past,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that the fruit of entering the stream is future,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that the fruit of entering the stream is present.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: one should not practice with the idea that the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is past,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The fruit of once-returner is not connected with the future.”

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi @201a *//
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'das pa zhes bya bar mi @201a *//
translated: “The fruit of once-returner is not connected with the present.”🔽“The fruit of non-returner is not connected with the past.”

original: sbyor ro // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bum 'ongs ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sbyor ro // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bum 'ongs ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The fruit of non-returner is not connected with the future.”

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // dgra bcom pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The fruit of non-returner is not connected with the present.”🔽“Arhatship is not connected with the past.”

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “Arhatship is not connected with the future.”

original: dgra bcom pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rang byang chub 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rang byang chub ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rang byang chub 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rang byang chub ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “Arhatship is not connected with the present.”🔽“Individual enlightenment is not connected with the past.”🔽“Individual enlightenment is not connected with the future.”

original: rang byang chub da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “Individual enlightenment is not connected with the present.”

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join ‘the knowledge of path aspects’ with the past.🔽He does not join ‘the knowledge of path aspects’ with the future.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join ‘the knowledge of path aspects’ with the present.🔽He does not join ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ with the past.🔽He does not join ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ with the future.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: He does not join ‘the knowledge of all aspects’ with the present.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: are said to be striving in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: Moreover, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not engage with the idea that form is stable or that it is unstable.

original: tshor ba brtan zhes bya @201b ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba brtan zhes bya @201b ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that feeling is stable or that it is unstable.

original: 'du shes brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du shes brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that perception is stable or that it is unstable.

original: 'du byed brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that volitional factors are stable or that they are unstable.

original: rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that consciousness is stable or that it is unstable.

original: mig brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the eyes are stable or that they are unstable.

original: rna ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rna ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the ears are stable or that they are unstable.

original: sna brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sna brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the idea that the nose is stable or that it is unstable.

analyzed: reg brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

translated: “They do not engage with the notion that visual consciousness is stable or that it is unstable,

analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //

translated: They do not engage with the tongue consciousness as stable or unstable.

original: sbyor ro // lus kyi rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sbyor ro // lus kyi rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the body consciousness as stable or unstable.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thinking consciousness as stable or unstable.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna'i 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the sensory element of the eyes, the sensory element of sights, and the sensory element of visual consciousness as stable or unstable.🔽They do not engage with the sensory element of the ears, the sensory element of sounds, and the sensory element of auditory consciousness as stable or unstable.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the sensory element of the nose, the sensory element of smells, and the sensory element of olfactory consciousness as stable or unstable.🔽They do not engage with the sensory element of the tongue, the sensory element of tastes, and the sensory element of gustatory consciousness as stable or unstable.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the composite of contact at the body sense-sphere is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the composite of contact at the mind-sense is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the eye sense-sphere is permanent or that it is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the thought that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the ear sense-sphere is permanent or that it is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the thought that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the nose sense-sphere is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the tongue sense-sphere is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the thought that the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the body sense-sphere is permanent or that it is impermanent.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @202b ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @202b ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the condition of contact at the mind-base as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: sa'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sa'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the earth element as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: chu'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;me'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chu'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;me'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the water element as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable. He does not engage with the fire element as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: rlung gi khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rlung gi khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the wind element as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: nam mkha'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the space element as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the consciousness element as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: ma rig pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with ignorance as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: 'du byed brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'du byed brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with conditioning as something that can be shown to be either stable or unstable.

original: rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: consciousness is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: ming dang gzugs brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: name-and-form is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: skye mched drug brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: skye mched drug brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: the six sense spheres are not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: reg pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: contact is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshor ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: feeling is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: sred pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sred pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: craving is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: len pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: len pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: grasping is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: srid pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: srid pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: existence is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: skye ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: skye ba brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: birth is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: rga shi brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rga shi brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: old age and death is not connected with being stable or not stable.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan @203a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan @203a *//
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of generosity is stable,

original: zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: or that it is unstable.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is stable, or that it is unstable.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of tolerance is stable, or that it is unstable.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of perseverance is stable, or that it is unstable.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is stable, or that it is unstable.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is stable, or that it is unstable.

original: nang stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the notion that internal emptiness is stable, or that it is unstable.

original: phyi stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of the external as either having a core or not having a core.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of the external and internal as either having a core or not having a core.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bar mi sbyor ro; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bar mi sbyor ro; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of emptiness as either having a core or not having a core.

original: chen po stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of great extent as either having a core or not having a core.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of ultimate reality as either having a core or not having a core.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of conditioned phenomena as either having a core or not having a core.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena as either having a core or not having a core.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of the unlimited as either having a core or not having a core.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brtan @203b zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brtan @203b zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not grasped as stable or not grasped as unstable.🔽

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The emptiness that is nothing whatsoever” is not something to be engaged with in terms of being stable or unstable.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The emptiness of essential nature” is not something to be engaged with in terms of being stable or unstable.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The emptiness of all phenomena” is not something to be engaged with in terms of being stable or unstable.🔽“The emptiness of specific characteristics” is not something to be engaged with in terms of being stable or unstable.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The emptiness of nonapprehension” is not something to be engaged with in terms of being stable or unstable.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “The emptiness of nonthings” is not something to be engaged with in terms of being stable or unstable.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of essential nature as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of nonapprehension as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of nonexistence as either stable or unstable.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of all things as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of nonthings as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of all things as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of nonthings as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of essential nature as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of nonapprehension as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the emptiness of nonexistence as either stable or unstable.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the applications of mindfulness as either stable or unstable.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the right efforts as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the legs of miraculous power as either stable or unstable.🔽He does not engage with the faculties as either stable or unstable.

original: dbang po rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽stobs rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dbang po rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // stobs rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the powers as either stable or unstable.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the branches of awakening as either stable or unstable.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽'phags pa'i bden @204a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // 'phags pa'i bden @204a *//
translated: they do not engage with the noble eightfold path in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the noble truths in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: bsam gtan rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the meditative concentrations in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: tshad med pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the immeasurable aspirations in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the formless absorptions in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the eight aspects of liberation in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with the nine serial steps of meditative absorption in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not engage with emptiness in terms of ‘stable’ or ‘unstable.’

original: mtshan ma med pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: They do not apply the notions of ‘permanent’ or ‘impermanent’ to the signless.🔽

original: smon pa med pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mngon par shes pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro; ;mngon par shes pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // ting nge 'dzin rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro // gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: they do not engage with the notion that the gateways to liberation are empty, and they do not engage with the notion that they are not empty; they do not engage with the notion that the gateways to liberation are with signs, and they do not engage with the notion that they are signless; they do not engage with the notion that the gateways to liberation are having aspirations, and they do not engage with the notion that they are without aspirations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “They do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are with afflictions, and they do not engage with the notion that they are without afflictions; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are with defilement, and they do not engage with the notion that they are without defilement; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are with secondary defilements, and they do not engage with the notion that they are without secondary defilements; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are compounded, and they do not engage with the notion that they are uncompounded; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are arising, and they do not engage with the notion that they are not arising; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are ceasing, and they do not engage with the notion that they are not ceasing; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are entities, and they do not engage with the notion that they are nonentities; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are existent, and they do not engage with the notion that they are nonexistent; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are empty, and they do not engage with the notion that they are not empty; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are with signs, and they do not engage with the notion that they are signless; they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are having aspirations, and they do not engage with the notion that they are without aspirations.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: “They do not engage with the notion that the four assurances are with afflictions, and they do not engage

original: byams pa chen po brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes @204b bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes @204b bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that great love is something that is stable or that it is something that is not stable.

original: snying rje chen po brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that great compassion is something that is stable or that it is something that is not stable.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are something that is stable or that they are something that is not stable.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the result of entering the stream is something that is stable or that it is something that is not stable.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the result of being tied to one more rebirth is something that is stable or that it is something that is not stable.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that the result of no longer being subject to rebirth is something that is stable or that it is something that is not stable.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that arhatship is something that is stable or that it is something that is not stable.

original: rang byang chub brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not engage with the notion that individual enlightenment is something that is stable or that it is something that is not stable.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the knowledge of path aspects as ‘firm’ or ‘not firm.’

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: He does not join with the knowledge of all aspects as ‘firm’ or ‘not firm.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings practicing like that

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o ////
translated: are said to be striving in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu pa /
translated: Fascicle Ten

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽'du shes yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi @205a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // 'du shes yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi @205a *//
translated: Moreover, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not join with or distinguish form as ‘existent’ or ‘nonexistent.’🔽They do not join with or distinguish feeling as ‘existent’ or ‘nonexistent.’

original: sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not join with or distinguish perception as ‘existent’ or ‘nonexistent.’🔽They do not join with or distinguish volitional factors as ‘existent’ or ‘nonexistent.’

original: 'du byed yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘volitional factors exist’ or ‘volitional factors do not exist.’

original: rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do; ;mig yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do; ;mig yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘consciousness exists’ or ‘consciousness does not exist.’ They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘the eyes exist’ or ‘the eyes do not exist.’

original: rna ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽sna yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rna ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // sna yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘the ears exist’ or ‘the ears do not exist.’

original: lce yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lce yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘the nose exists’ or ‘the nose does not exist.’🔽They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘the tongue exists’ or ‘the tongue does not exist.’

original: lus yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lus yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘the body exists’ or ‘the body does not exist.’

original: yid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: yid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘the mental faculty exists’ or ‘the mental faculty does not exist.’

original: gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘form exists’ or ‘form does not exist.’

original: sgra yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: sgra yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘sound exists’ or ‘sound does not exist.’

original: dri yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: dri yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement ‘smell exists’ or ‘smell does not exist.’

original: ro yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: ro yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘taste exists’ or ‘taste does not exist.’

original: reg yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: reg yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘touch exists’ or ‘touch does not exist.’

original: chos yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: chos yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘phenomena exist’ or ‘phenomena do not exist.’

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘the eye consciousness exists’ or ‘the eye consciousness does not exist.’

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // sna'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘the ear consciousness exists’ or ‘the ear consciousness does not exist.’🔽He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘the nose consciousness exists’ or ‘the nose consciousness does not exist.’

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya @205b bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya @205b bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘the tongue consciousness exists’ or ‘the tongue consciousness does not exist.’

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘the body consciousness exists’ or ‘the body consciousness does not exist.’

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not engage with or become separated from the statement ‘the mind consciousness exists’ or ‘the mind consciousness does not exist.’

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘The sensory element of the eyes exists’ or ‘The sensory element of the eyes does not exist. ’🔽They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘The sensory element of the ears exists’ or ‘The sensory element of the ears does not exist. ’🔽They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘The sensory element of the nose exists’ or ‘The sensory element of the nose does not exist. ’

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘The sensory element of the tongue exists’ or ‘The sensory element of the tongue does not exist. ’

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘The sensory element of the body exists’ or ‘The sensory element of the body does not exist. ’

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘The sensory element of the mental faculty exists’ or ‘The sensory element of the mental faculty does not exist. ’

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘Feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is visually compounded exists’ or ‘Feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is visually compounded does not exist. ’

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage in or disengage from the statement, ‘Feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is compounded with the ears exists’ or ‘Feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is compounded with the ears does not exist. ’
