original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded exists or does not exist.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi @206a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi @206a *//
translated: He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is compounded with the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thought exists or does not exist.

original: 'byed do // sa'i khams yod ces bya'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: 'byed do // sa'i khams yod ces bya'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the earth element exists or does not exist.

original: chu'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: chu'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the water element exists or does not exist.

original: me'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: me'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the fire element exists or does not exist.

original: rlung gi khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the wind element exists or does not exist.🔽He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the space element exists or does not exist.🔽He does not apply or misapply himself, saying that the consciousness element exists or does not exist.

original: nam mkha'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that the space element exists or does not exist.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that the consciousness element exists or does not exist.

original: ma rig pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: ma rig pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that ignorance exists or does not exist.

original: 'du byed yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that volitional factors exist or do not exist.

original: rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that consciousness exists or does not exist.

original: ming dang gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that name and form exist or do not exist.

original: skye mched drug yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: skye mched drug yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that the six sense spheres exist or do not exist.

original: reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: reg pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that contact exists or does not exist.

original: tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that feeling exists or does not exist.

original: sred pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: sred pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that craving is existent or nonexistent.

original: len pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: len pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that grasping is existent or nonexistent.

original: srid pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: srid pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that becoming is existent or nonexistent.

original: skye ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi @206b sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: skye ba yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi @206b sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that birth is existent or nonexistent.

original: rga shi yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rga shi yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that old age and death is existent or nonexistent.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro 'byed do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that the perfection of giving is existent or nonexistent.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that the perfection of morality is existent or nonexistent.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that the perfection of patience is existent or nonexistent.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or discriminate that the perfection of effort is existent or nonexistent.🔽He does not apply or discriminate that the perfection of meditation is existent or nonexistent.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that the transcendent perfection of wisdom is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that internal emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that external emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that internal and external emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that the emptiness of emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that great emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the notion that ultimate emptiness is empty, or that it is not empty.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disentangle themselves from the notion that the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is something that exists or is something that does not exist.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong @207a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // mtha' las 'das pa stong @207a *//
translated: They do not engage with or disentangle themselves from the notion that the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is something that exists or is something that does not exist.

original: pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disentangle themselves from the notion that the emptiness of what transcends limits is something that exists or is something that does not exist.🔽They do not engage with or disentangle themselves from the notion that the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is something that exists or is something that does not exist.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disentangle themselves from the notion that the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is something that exists or is something that does not exist.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disentangle themselves from the notion that the emptiness of inherent existence is something that exists or is something that does not exist.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disentangle themselves from the notion that the emptiness of all phenomena is something that exists or is something that does not exist.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or distinguish ‘the emptiness of its own mark exists’ or ‘does not exist.’

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or distinguish ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension exists’ or ‘does not exist.’

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or distinguish ‘the emptiness of non-things exists’ or ‘does not exist.’

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or distinguish ‘the emptiness of essential nature exists’ or ‘does not exist.’

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or distinguish ‘the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things exists’ or ‘does not exist.’

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or distinguish ‘the applications of mindfulness exist’ or ‘do not exist.’

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: He does not apply or distinguish ‘the right efforts exist’ or ‘do not exist.’

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽dbang po rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // dbang po rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not construe or discriminate the bases of supernatural powers as existent or nonexistent.🔽They do not construe or discriminate the faculties as existent or nonexistent.

original: stobs rnams yod ces bya @207b ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod ces bya @207b ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not construe or discriminate the powers as existent or nonexistent.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not construe or discriminate the branches of awakening as existent or nonexistent.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not construe or discriminate the noble eightfold path as existent or nonexistent.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not construe or discriminate the noble truths as existent or nonexistent.

original: bsam gtan rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not construe or discriminate the meditative stabilities as existent or nonexistent.

original: tshad med pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not construe or discriminate the immeasurable aspirations as existent or nonexistent.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the formless absorptions, saying that they exist or do not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the eight aspects of liberation, saying that they exist or do not exist.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, saying that they exist or do not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation, saying that they exist or do not exist.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the higher cognitions, saying that they exist or do not exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the meditative stabilities, saying that they exist or do not exist.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or become separated from the dhāraṇī gateways, saying that they exist or do not exist.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod ces @208a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod ces @208a *//
translated: He does not apply the expression “the ten powers of the Tathāgata exist” or “do not exist.

original: ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: ” He does not apply the expression “the four grounds of fearlessness exist” or “do not exist.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽byams pa chen po yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // byams pa chen po yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: ” He does not apply the expression “the four detailed and thorough knowledges exist” or “do not exist.🔽” He does not apply the expression “great love exists” or “does not exist.

original: snying rje chen po yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: ” He does not apply the expression “great compassion exists” or “does not exist.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: ” He does not apply the expression “the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha exist” or “do not exist.🔽” He does not apply the expression “the result of stream enterer exists” or “does not exist.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: ” He does not apply the expression “the result of once-returner exists” or “does not exist.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: they do not engage with or disengage from the statement, ‘The fruit of non-returning exists’ or ‘The fruit of non-returning does not exist.’

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement, ‘Arhatship exists’ or ‘Arhatship does not exist.’

original: rang byang chub yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement, ‘A pratyekabuddha’s awakening exists’ or ‘A pratyekabuddha’s awakening does not exist.’

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement, ‘The knowledge of path aspects exists’ or ‘The knowledge of path aspects does not exist.’

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do //
translated: They do not engage with or disengage from the statement, ‘The knowledge of all aspects exists’ or ‘The knowledge of all aspects does not exist.’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so; ;mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so; ;mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not apprehend ‘I am practicing’ or ‘I am not practicing.’

original: spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so //🔽spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so // spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They do not apprehend ‘I am practicing and not practicing’ or ‘I am neither practicing nor not practicing.’

original: mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend ‘I am practicing’ or ‘I am not practicing.’🔽They do not apprehend ‘I am practicing and not practicing’ or ‘I am neither practicing nor not practicing.’

original: @208b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: @208b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice accordingly

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: are said to be diligent in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they do not practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom for the sake of the transcendent perfection of generosity.🔽They do not practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom for the sake of the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline.🔽They do not practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom for the sake of the transcendent perfection of tolerance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom for the sake of the transcendent perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽'dus ma byas @209a *//
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // 'dus ma byas @209a *//
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do; ;thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do; ;thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do; ;rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do; ;rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽skye ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // skye ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.🔽They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of non-arising.

original: 'gag pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the emptiness of non-ceasing.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the irreversible level.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i @209b don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i @209b don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of bringing beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of purifying a buddhafield.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the right efforts.🔽They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the aspects of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @210a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @210a *//
translated: For the sake of the nine serial absorptions, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: For the sake of the emptiness gate to liberation, the signless gate to liberation, and the wishless gate to liberation, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: For the sake of the clairvoyances, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: For the sake of the meditative stabilizations, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: For the sake of the dhāraṇī gateways, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: For the sake of the ten tathāgata powers, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: For the sake of the four fearlessnesses, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the great love.

original: snying rje chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of suchness.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the dharma-constituent.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the very limit of reality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos gang la'ang tha dad pa'am /🔽bye brag gam /
analyzed: chos gang la'ang tha dad pa'am / bye brag gam /
translated: He does not see any dharma as separate,🔽or as different,

original: khyad par du lta ba med do //
analyzed: khyad par du lta ba med do //
translated: or as distinct.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: @210b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: @210b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: a bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices like this

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: is said to be endeavoring in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: de lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the divine eye.

original: lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the divine ear.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of knowledge of the minds of others.

original: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of knowledge of past lives.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of the various kinds of miraculous abilities.

original: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of knowledge of the exhaustion of defilements.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
analyzed: 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na /
translated: it is because when they practice the perfection of wisdom they do not even see the perfection of wisdom itself,

original: byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone a bodhisattva.

original: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mngon par shes pa dmigs pa lta ga las 'ongs /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mngon par shes pa dmigs pa lta ga las 'ongs /
translated: How could they possibly apprehend a bodhisattva in any respect?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom in that manner,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //
translated: they are said to be diligent in the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam du /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam du /
translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they should contemplate the following:

original: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
analyzed: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
translated: ‘I should abide in the bases of miraculous power,

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed @211a *//
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed @211a *//
translated: In the east, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, there are as many buddhas, bhagavats,🔽

original: bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //🔽bkur stir bya'o //
analyzed: bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o // bkur stir bya'o //
translated: “He does not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and serve all the lord buddhas who dwell in the world systems of the eastern direction, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River.🔽I will honor them,🔽I will venerate them,

original: phu dud du bya'o //🔽mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: phu dud du bya'o // mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: I will respect them,

original: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
analyzed: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
translated: and I will make offerings to them.’

original: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //🔽bkur stir bya'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o // bkur stir bya'o //
translated: “He does not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and serve all the lord buddhas who dwell in the world systems of the southern direction, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River.🔽I will honor them,🔽I will venerate them,

original: phu dud du bya'o //
analyzed: phu dud du bya'o //
translated: I will respect them,

original: mchod par bya'o //🔽snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: mchod par bya'o // snyam du mi sems so //
translated: and I will make offerings to them.’

original: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
analyzed: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
translated: “He does not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and serve all the lord buddhas who dwell in the world systems of the western direction, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River.

original: nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //
translated: I will not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and go to the world systems in the eastern direction, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, in order to serve and attend to the lord buddhas there, and to honor them with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various kinds of music, and to honor the Dharma with the highest praise.’

original: bkur stir bya'o //🔽phu dud du bya'o //
analyzed: bkur stir bya'o // phu dud du bya'o //
translated: I will not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and go to the world systems in the southern direction, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, in order to serve and attend to the lord buddhas there, and to honor them with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various kinds of music, and to honor the Dharma with the highest praise.’

original: mchod par bya'o //🔽snyam du mi sems so //🔽bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /🔽byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya'o // snyam du mi sems so // bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //
translated: I will not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and go to the world systems in the western direction, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, in order to serve and attend to the lord buddhas there, and to honor them with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various kinds of music, and to honor the Dharma with the highest praise.’🔽I will not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and go to the world systems in the northern direction, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, in order to serve and attend to the lord buddhas there, and to honor them with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various kinds of music, and to honor the Dharma with the highest praise.’

original: bkur stir bya'o //🔽phu dud du bya'o //🔽mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: bkur stir bya'o // phu dud du bya'o // mchod par bya'o //
translated: I will not think, ‘I will stand in the bases of supernatural power and go to the world systems in the intermediate directions, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, in order to serve and attend to the lord buddhas there, and to honor them with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various kinds of music, and to honor the Dharma with the highest praise.’

original: snyam du mi sems so //🔽bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
analyzed: snyam du mi sems so //🔽bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /
translated: I will not think, ‘I

original: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //
analyzed: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o //
translated: I will serve all the lord buddhas who reside in the world systems of the southern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges.

original: bkur stir @211b bya'o; ;phu dud du bya'o //
analyzed: bkur stir @211b bya'o; ;phu dud du bya'o //
translated: I will honor them, I will revere them, I will worship them, and I will make offerings to them.🔽I will serve all the lord buddhas who reside in the world systems of the western direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges.

original: mchod par bya'o //🔽snyam du mi sems so //🔽bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te /

analyzed: de dag gi sngon gyi gnas bdag gis rjes su dran par bya'o //

analyzed: lha'i mig gis sems can de dag 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes par 'gyur ba rnams bdag gis mthong bar bya'o //
translated: With my divine eye I will see those sentient beings passing away and being born, and those who have passed away and been born.

analyzed: sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: I will lead to complete nirvāṇa countless, innumerable sentient beings.

original: snyam du mi sems te /
analyzed: snyam du mi sems te /
translated: They do not think like that.🔽🔽

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o //

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, even the māras who seek an opportunity and try to find fault will not be able to find an opportunity.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams @212b cad kyang lhun gyis grub pa dang / yongs su brtag pa med par mthun par 'grub bo //

translated: Whatever mundane and supramundane activities there are, all of them are spontaneously accomplished and accomplished in accordance with [one's] wishes, without [one's] having to think about them.

original: 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever mundane afflictions there are, all of them are completely eliminated.

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
