analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: When a Bodhisattva, a great being, courses in the perfection of wisdom, he does not produce the notion of a being,

original: bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: he does not produce the notion of a self,

original: srog gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: srog gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: he does not produce the notion of a soul,

original: 'gro ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o //🔽gso ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o //🔽skyes bu'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o // gso ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o // skyes bu'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: he does not produce the notion of a person,🔽he does not produce the notion of an individual,🔽he does not produce the notion of a human being,

original: gang zag gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: gang zag gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: he does not produce the notion of a man,

original: shed can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: shed can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: he does not produce the notion of one who is trained,🔽he does not produce the notion of one who is not trained.

original: shed bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: shed bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: the notion of a self does not arise,

original: byed pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: byed pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: the notion of an agent does not arise,

original: tshor ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: tshor ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: the notion of a feeler does not arise,

original: shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: the notion of a knower does not arise,

original: mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o //
translated: the notion of a seer does not arise.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because sentient beings are utterly unborn and unceasing.

original: sems can la ni /
analyzed: sems can la ni /
translated: Sentient beings

original: skye ba dang 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'gag pa med do //
translated: are not born and do not cease.

original: gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de /
analyzed: gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de /
translated: Those who are not born and do not cease

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: how could they practice the perfection of wisdom?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /🔽sems can skye ba med pas /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / sems can skye ba med pas / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: bodhisattva great beings who practice like that🔽practice the perfection of wisdom because sentient beings are unborn.

original: sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu @221b phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu @221b phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom because sentient beings are emptiness.

original: sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom by not observing sentient beings.

original: sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /🔽sems can rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin / sems can rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom by the isolation of sentient beings.🔽They practice the perfection of wisdom by the absence of intrinsic nature of sentient beings.

original: sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te /
translated: They practice the perfection of wisdom by the lack of intrinsic nature of sentient beings.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste /
translated: this is the highest yoga of bodhisattva great beings,

original: 'di ltar / stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to //
analyzed: 'di ltar / stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to //
translated: namely, the yoga of emptiness.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor te /
translated: this is the yoga of bodhisattva great beings in the perfection of wisdom.

original: des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so //
analyzed: des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so //
translated: It outshines all other yogas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices this yoga🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices this yoga accomplishes the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: He accomplishes the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices this yoga

original: ser sna'i sems mi skye'o //🔽tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab @222a *//
analyzed: ser sna'i sems mi skye'o // tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab @222a *//
translated: does not give rise to a miserly mind.🔽He does not give rise to a mind of bad ethics, a mind of harm, a mind of laziness, a mind of distraction, or a mind of

original: 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: debased wisdom.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this was said, Śāradvatīputra said to the Bhagavān,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Bhagavān,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags /
translated: “Lord, when bodhisattva great beings who practice this yoga of the perfection of wisdom die here, where are they reborn?

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni /
translated: And when they die there,🔽where are they reborn?”

original: gang du skye bar 'gyur; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gang du skye bar 'gyur; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni /
translated: you should know that bodhisattva great beings who practice this yoga of the perfection of wisdom

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am /
translated: have died in other buddhafields and been reborn here,

original: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o //
translated: or have died in the class of gods of Tuṣita and been reborn here.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni /
translated: you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have died in other buddhafields and been reborn here

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste /
translated: In this way, the yoga of the perfection of wisdom is quickly accomplished.

original: tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even after passing away from this life, these profound dharmas will manifest to them.

original: de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: And after that, they will enter into equipoise on the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: They will be born in those buddha realms where the tathāgatas, arhats, and perfectly enlightened buddhas dwell, live, and remain.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa @222b dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa @222b dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will serve those tathāgatas, arhats, and perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni /
translated: in that regard, those bodhisattva great beings who pass away from the Tuṣita gods and are born here

original: tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste /
analyzed: tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste /
translated: He is one who is impeded by only one birth.

original: de ni / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de ni / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o //
translated: He is one who does not regress in the six perfections.

original: gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do //
translated: There is no dhāraṇī gateway or samādhi gateway that is not included in that.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni /
translated: a bodhisattva great being who dies as a human and is reborn among humans

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te /
translated: is one of dull faculties, except for the irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no; ;de la gzugs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no; ;de la gzugs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He is not one who quickly enters into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom, and the gateways of form and the gateways of samādhi do not quickly manifest to him.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de /
analyzed: gang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de /
translated: You say, “The bodhisattva great being who enters into the yoga of this perfection of wisdom,🔽

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni /
translated: “You have asked, ‘Where will those bodhisattva great beings who enter into this yoga of the perfection of wisdom be reborn after they die here?’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings

original: 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der @223a *//
analyzed: 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der @223a *//
translated: will be reborn in a buddhafield where the lord buddhas🔽are present,

original: 'gro ste / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ste / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will not be separated from the lord buddhas until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings who are not skilled in means

original: bsam gtan dang po la'ang mnyam par gzhog /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la'ang mnyam par gzhog /
translated: They also enter into the first concentration.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog /
translated: They also enter into the second concentration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog /
translated: They also enter into the third concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang spyod de /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang spyod de /
translated: They also enter into the fourth concentration, and they also practice the six perfections.

original: de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing /
analyzed: de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing /
translated: Having attained the concentrations, they are reborn among the long-lived gods.

original: gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na'ang de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba'ang yod do //
analyzed: gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na'ang de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba'ang yod do //
translated: If they obtain a human birth and serve the blessed buddhas, they will have dull faculties and not sharp faculties.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog la /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog la /
translated: “Moreover, Śāradvatīputra, bodhisattva great beings also enter into the second concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de /
translated: and they also practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas /
analyzed: de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas /
translated: But they are not skilled in means.

original: bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de /
translated: They also give up the dhyānas and are reborn in the desire realm.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings are of dull faculties.

original: dbang po rno ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rno ba ma yin no //
translated: They are not of sharp faculties.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam @223b gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam @223b gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: it is like this: Bodhisattva great beings also enter the first dhyāna,

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter the second dhyāna,

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter the third dhyāna,

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug ;byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug ;byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter the fourth dhyāna, they also enter loving kindness,

original: snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter compassion,

original: dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter joy,

original: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter equanimity,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter the sphere of infinite space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they also enter the sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing whatsoever.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the four applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the four correct exertions.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug /🔽dbang po lnga la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug / dbang po lnga la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the four legs of miraculous power.🔽They also enter the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: stobs lnga la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the seven branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They also enter the noble eightfold path.

original: snying rje chen po la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: They also enter great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas /🔽bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas / bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye /
translated: Endowed with great compassion, they are skilled in means.🔽They do not take birth through the power of concentration.

original: tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye /
translated: They do not take birth through the power of pure conduct.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste /🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs @224a *//🔽shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs @224a *// shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do //
translated: They do not take rebirth through the power of the formless absorptions.🔽They are reborn in those places where the blessed buddhas are present,🔽where they are living,

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: and where they are caring for beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas /
translated: They are never separated from the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: In this very Fortunate Eon, they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: “Moreover, Śāradvatīputra, bodhisattva great beings enter into the first concentration,

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they enter into the second concentration,

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they enter into the third concentration,

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /🔽byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug / byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they enter into the fourth concentration,🔽they enter into loving kindness,

original: snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: they enter into compassion,

original: dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /

original: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite space.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothingness.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: They enter the meditative absorption of the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye'o //🔽de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye'o // de dag ni /
translated: But through their skill in means, they are not reborn by the power of meditative absorption, concentration, or meditative attainment.

original: phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: Even though they are reborn in this desire realm, they are reborn in a high and powerful family of the warrior class.

original: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: They are reborn in a high and powerful family of brahmins.

original: @224b khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste /
analyzed: @224b khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste /
translated: They are reborn in a high and powerful family of householders.

original: de'ang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'ang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi /
translated: But not because they crave existence.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to bring beings to full maturity.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

translated: enter the sense field of infinite consciousness,

analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: enter the sense field of nothing-at-all,

analyzed: bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod de /

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They are:

original: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //🔽sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o // sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //
translated: They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Yāma Heaven.

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //🔽'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //🔽gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba @225a *//
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o // 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba @225a *//
translated: They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Tuṣita Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Nirmāṇarati Heaven.

original: mnyam par skye ste /
analyzed: mnyam par skye ste /
translated: They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Brahmā world.

original: de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Ābhāsvara Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Śubhakṛtsna Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Bṛhatphala Heaven.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Śuddhāvāsa Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Aviha Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Atapa Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Sudarśana Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Sudṛśa Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Akaniṣṭha Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Ākāśānantyāyatana Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Vijñānānantyāyatana Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Ākiñcanyāyatana Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Mahābrahmā Heaven.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Brahmapurohita Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Brahmakāyika Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Parīttābha Heaven.🔽They are born with the same fortune as the gods of the Apramāṇā

analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas /

analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug / byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: enter into the fourth concentration,🔽enter into loving kindness,

analyzed: snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: enter into compassion,

analyzed: dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /

analyzed: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /

analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /

analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They are

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o //
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o //
translated: After they die, they will be reborn in the world of Brahmā.

original: de dag de na'ang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na'ang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag de na'ang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na'ang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: There, they will be the most excellent, the best, the most sublime, the most exalted among those beings who have great power and authority over a hundred Brahmās in the great Brahmā world.

original: de dag de na 'khod cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing /
analyzed: de dag de na 'khod cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing /
translated: They will go from buddhafield to buddhafield, to those buddhafields where the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas have attained perfect buddhahood

original: chos kyi @225b 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi @225b 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dong ngo //
translated: and are present, having turned the wheel of Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do //
translated: They will request those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas to turn the wheel of Dharma.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings who are impeded by only one birth

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas /
translated: practice the perfection of wisdom with skill in means.

analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the first concentration.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the second concentration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the third concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /🔽byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug / byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the fourth concentration.🔽They become absorbed in loving kindness.

original: snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug /🔽dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug / dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in compassion.🔽They become absorbed in joy.

original: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in equanimity.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the sense field of infinite space.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the sense field of infinite consciousness.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the sense field of nothing-at-all.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug /
translated: They become absorbed in the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'ang yongs su sgom /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'ang yongs su sgom /
translated: They also fully cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'ang yongs su sgom /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi'ang yongs su sgom /
translated: They also fully cultivate the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang yongs su sgom /🔽dbang po lnga'ang yongs su sgom /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang yongs su sgom / dbang po lnga'ang yongs su sgom /
translated: They also fully cultivate the four legs of magical emanation.🔽They also fully cultivate the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga'ang yongs su sgom /
analyzed: stobs lnga'ang yongs su sgom /
translated: They also fully cultivate the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang yongs su sgom /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang yongs su sgom /
translated: They also fully cultivate the seven factors of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang yongs su sgom /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang yongs su sgom /
translated: They also fully cultivate the eightfold noble path.

original: stong @226a *// pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod do //
analyzed: stong @226a *// pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba'ang yod do //
translated: They also enter into the meditative absorption of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and they are not reborn due to the power of those meditative absorptions.

original: de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing /
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing /
translated: They serve the actual Buddhas, the Blessed Ones.

original: de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de /
analyzed: de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de /
translated: They practice pure conduct in their presence.

original: dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o //
translated: They are reborn with the same fortune as the Tuṣita gods.

original: de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas dbang po ma nyams pa dang / dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi🔽'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do ////
analyzed: de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas dbang po ma nyams pa dang / dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do ////
translated: They are reborn here after having lived out their lives there, and they are surrounded and attended by many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of koṭis of devas, and they demonstrate their rebirth here with unimpaired faculties, mindful and fully aware, and after they have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they turn the wheel of the Dharma in various buddhafields.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Śatasāhasrikāprajñāpāramitā

original: bam po bcu gcig pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu gcig pa /
translated: Eleventh fascicle

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye /
translated: it is like this: There are also bodhisattva mahāsattvas who have attained the six superknowledges and are not reborn in the desire realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye /
translated: not reborn in the form realm,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing /
translated: They do not take birth in the formless realm, but instead serve, venerate, honor, and worship the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: They go from buddha realm to buddha realm.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di @226b ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /
analyzed: 'di @226b ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /
translated: there are also bodhisattva great beings who have attained the six superknowledges and who play with those six superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra'ang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra'ang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //
translated: They go from buddha realm to buddha realm, where the word ‘hearer vehicle’ or ‘solitary buddha vehicle’ is not even heard, except for the Great Vehicle.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra, there are also great bodhisattva beings who have attained the six extrasensory powers, and who, through those extrasensory powers, play with the supernormal cognitive abilities of the bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do //🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do // sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: They go from buddhafield to buddhafield, where the lifespan of sentient beings is immeasurable.

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra, there are also great bodhisattva beings who have attained the six extrasensory powers, and who, through those extrasensory powers, go from world system to world system, where the sound of the Buddha is not heard, where the sound of the Dharma is not heard, and where the sound of the Saṅgha is not heard.

original: sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod /
translated: They proclaim the excellence of the Buddha,

original: chos kyi legs pa brjod /
analyzed: chos kyi legs pa brjod /
translated: they proclaim the excellence of the Dharma,

original: dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod pas /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod pas /
translated: and they proclaim the excellence of the Saṅgha.

original: sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te /
analyzed: sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te /
translated: And those sentient beings, by the sound of the Buddha, the sound of the Dharma, and the sound of the Saṅgha, their minds become clear.

original: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa @227a *//🔽dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa @227a *// dag kyang yod do //
translated: They are reborn in those places where the Blessed Buddhas are.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: “There are also those bodhisattva great beings who, from the first production of the thought of awakening onward, have the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the five clairvoyances, the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven limbs of awakening, and the eightfold noble path.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and they never take birth in the desire realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye /
translated: never take birth in the form realm,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye zhing /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye zhing /
translated: never take birth in the formless realm,

original: de dag tu'ang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do //
analyzed: de dag tu'ang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do //
translated: and they benefit beings there.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra!

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa'ang yod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa'ang yod do //
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections, from the first production of the thought of awakening, enter into the flawlessness of the bodhisattvas and attain the irreversible stage.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla @227b na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla @227b na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /
translated: in this way, bodhisattva great beings, from the first production of the thought of awakening, fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do //
translated: and after their parinirvāṇa, the holy Dharma remains for an eon or the remainder of an eon.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the same way, a bodhisattva great being, from the first production of the thought, engages in the yoga of the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing /
translated: and

original: de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
analyzed: de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
translated: They are the bodhisattvas who, together with many quintillions of bodhisattvas, travel from buddhafield to buddhafield in order to see the lord buddhas, to bring beings to maturity,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: and to purify a buddhafield.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: “Śāriputra, there are bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: bsam gtan bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi thob pa /
translated: who have attained the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: who have attained the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mas rnam par rtse zhing /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mas rnam par rtse zhing /
translated: and who have attained the four formless absorptions, who play with those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions in many ways,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: and who, for example,

original: bsam @228a *// gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bsam @228a *// gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: enter into the first concentration,

original: de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /🔽'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Having risen from the first concentration, they enter into the meditative absorption of cessation.🔽Having risen from the meditative absorption of cessation, they enter into the second concentration.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /🔽'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Having risen from the second concentration, they enter into the meditative absorption of cessation.🔽Having risen from the meditative absorption of cessation, they enter into the third concentration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /🔽'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Having risen from the third concentration, they enter into the meditative absorption of cessation.🔽Having risen from the meditative absorption of cessation, they enter into the fourth concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: Having risen from the fourth concentration, they enter into the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Having risen from the meditative absorption of cessation, they enter into the sphere of infinite space.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: Having risen from the sphere of infinite space, he enters into the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Having risen from the meditative absorption of cessation, he enters into the meditative absorption of the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: Having risen from the sphere of infinite consciousness, he enters into the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug @228b pa las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug @228b pa las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Having risen from the meditative absorption of cessation, he enters into the meditative absorption of the sphere of nothingness.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /🔽'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Having risen from the sphere of nothingness, he enters into the meditative absorption of cessation.🔽Having risen from the meditative absorption of cessation, he enters into the meditative absorption of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: Having risen from the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, he enters into the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams /
translated: in this way, bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom, who are endowed with skill in means,

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: repeatedly enter into and emerge from these concentrations, immeasurables, meditative stabilizations, and absorptions.🔽Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: in this way, bodhisattva great beings who have attained the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa /
translated: who have attained the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa /🔽dbang po lnga thob pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa / dbang po lnga thob pa /
translated: who have attained the four legs of magical manifestation,🔽who have attained the five faculties,

original: stobs lnga thob pa /
analyzed: stobs lnga thob pa /
translated: who have attained the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa /
translated: who have attained the seven parts of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: who have attained the eightfold noble path,🔽who have attained the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi thob pa /
translated: who have attained the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams thob pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams thob pa /
translated: They have attained the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa /
translated: They have attained the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa /
translated: They have attained the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa /
translated: They have attained the nine serial absorptions.

original: @229a *// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa thob pa /
analyzed: @229a *// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa thob pa /
translated: They have attained emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa /
translated: They have attained the higher cognitions.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa /
translated: They have attained the meditative stabilities.🔽They have attained the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa /
translated: They have attained the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: They have attained the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: They have attained the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They have attained the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bo thob kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bo thob kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: They have attained the three gateways to liberation, but they do not attain the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: They do not attain the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed; dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed; dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed /
translated: they do not attain the fruit of non-returning, they do not attain the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi /
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi /
translated: they do not attain individual enlightenment,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas /
translated: but practicing the perfection of wisdom, they, through skill in means,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de /
translated: teach the noble eightfold path to beings.

original: sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Those beings, through that, attain the fruit of entering the stream, attain the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, attain the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, attain the state of a worthy one,🔽attain individual enlightenment.

original: rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de; sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de; sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni /
translated: the knowledge that śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas have for attaining the fruits

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te /
translated: This is the patience of bodhisattva great beings.

original: @229b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: @229b sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings who practice with such a perfection of wisdom

original: phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: should be known as irreversible.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /
translated: there are also bodhisattva great beings who, abiding in the six perfections,

original: dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su spyod pa dag kyang yod de /
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su spyod pa dag kyang yod de /
translated: enjoy the Tuṣita realm.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /
translated: Śāradvatīputra, those bodhisattva great beings

original: bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o //
translated: should be known as those of the Fortunate Eon.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /🔽bsam gtan bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / bsam gtan bzhi thob pa /
translated: there are also bodhisattva great beings who, practicing the perfection of wisdom,🔽attain the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: attain the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: they have attained the four formless absorptions;

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa; mngon par shes pa drug thob pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa; mngon par shes pa drug thob pa /
translated: they have attained the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment; they have attained the six superknowledges;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa /
translated: they have attained the ten powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: they have attained the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa /
translated: they have attained the four detailed and thorough knowledges;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag /
translated: they have attained the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de /
translated: and they practice in order to comprehend the four noble truths, but they do not realize the four noble truths.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings

original: tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: should be known to be impeded by one birth.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la @230a *//
translated: in the same vein, it is because great bodhisattva beings

analyzed: spyod pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing /
translated: They practice the conduct of bodhisattvas and go from world system to world system.

original: de dag gis sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de /
analyzed: de dag gis sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de /
translated: They encourage beings to attain awakening and purify buddha realms.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /🔽bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni / bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: attain unsurpassed and perfect awakening after countless, immeasurable eons.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /
translated: there are also bodhisattva great beings who, abiding in the six perfections,

original: sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson te /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson te /
translated: always strive for the welfare of beings.

original: nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra /
analyzed: nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra /
